org.jgrapes.core.internal

Class ComponentProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.ComponentNode
      • org.jgrapes.core.internal.ComponentProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Component>, Manager

    public class ComponentProxy
extends ComponentNode
    The ComponentProxy is a special ComponentNode that references the object implementing the Component interface (instead of being its base class).
    Author:
    mnl
